KILLRING.ENTRY: Sign-up for emails from The Present Finder

Newsletter

To receive emails of regular Special Offers enter your email address.

<% form_remote_tag(:url => shop_email_signup_path) do -%> <% better_fields_for :email_signup, @email_signup do |f| %>
<%= f.error_on :email_address %> <%= f.text_field :email_address, :maxlength => 255 %>
<% end %> <%= submit_tag 'Subscribe', :class => 'submit_button' %> <% end %>
